channel.title: Comments on: Hack This Site Realistic 6
channel.description: A place for my thoughts when I was starting to break into the information security feild

item.title: By: Jason Statham
item.dc:creator: Jason Statham
item.description: Hey Greame, I am extremely thankful for your effort it saved a lot of time for me, although i did not disclose my original name. Thanks once again.....
item.content:encoded:
Hey Greame,
I am extremely thankful for your effort it saved a lot of time for me, although i did not disclose my original name. Thanks once again…..
